Router LEDs Service

NOTICE:

The namespace prefix http://cisco.com/jnap/ has been deprecated but is still supported. All JNAP clients should switch to the new namespace prefix http://linksys.com/jnap/.

Change History

Revision Date Notes
3.0.1 2023-10-04 Added RouterLEDs4 service for configuration of LED night mode with LED off.

Added the following:
  • action SetLedNightModeSetting2
3.0.0 2023-02-20 Added RouterLEDs3 service for configuration of LED night mode.

Added the following:
  • action GetLedNightModeSetting
  • action SetLedNightModeSetting
2.0.0 2019-07-17 Added RouterLEDs2 service to indicate the following action now requires authentication:
  • GetRouterLEDSettings

Services

RouterLEDs

http://linksys.com/jnap/routerleds/RouterLEDs
This service provides access to a router's LED settings.

Service Actions

  • GetRouterLEDSettings
  • SetRouterLEDSettings

RouterLEDs2

http://linksys.com/jnap/routerleds/RouterLEDs2
This service provides access to a router's LED settings.

Service Actions

  • GetRouterLEDSettings
  • SetRouterLEDSettings

RouterLEDs3

http://linksys.com/jnap/routerleds/RouterLEDs3

Service Actions

  • GetLedNightModeSetting
  • GetRouterLEDSettings
  • SetLedNightModeSetting
  • SetRouterLEDSettings

RouterLEDs4

http://linksys.com/jnap/routerleds/RouterLEDs4

Service Actions

  • GetLedNightModeSetting
  • GetRouterLEDSettings
  • SetLedNightModeSetting
  • SetLedNightModeSetting2
  • SetRouterLEDSettings

Actions

GetLedNightModeSetting

http://linksys.com/jnap/routerleds/GetLedNightModeSetting
This action is used to get state of LED night mode

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
Enable bool no state of LED night mode setting.
StartingTime int yes Starting hour [0 - 23]
EndingTime int yes Ending hour [0 - 23]
AllDayOff bool yes AllDay mode enable that mean turn off LED node

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/routerleds/GetLedNightModeSettingResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorGetCFG Eror when getting the configuration.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/routerleds/GetLedNightModeSetting"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "Enable": true,
    "StartingTime": 22,
    "EndingTime": 08,
    "AllDayOff": true
  }
}

GetRouterLEDSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/routerleds/GetRouterLEDSettings
This service provides access to a router's LED settings. This action gets the router's LED settings.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
isSwitchportLEDEnabled bool no Whether the router's switchport LED is currently enabled.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/routerleds/GetRouterLEDSettingsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/routerleds/GetRouterLEDSettings"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "isSwitchportLEDEnabled": true
  }
}

SetLedNightModeSetting

http://linksys.com/jnap/routerleds/SetLedNightModeSetting
This action is used to enable/disable LED night mode feature.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
Enable bool no Enable/Disable LED night mode feature.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/routerleds/SetLedNightModeSettingResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorSetupFail The setting configuration is fail.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/routerleds/SetLedNightModeSetting"

{
  "Enable": true
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

SetLedNightModeSetting2

http://linksys.com/jnap/routerleds/SetLedNightModeSetting2
This action is used to enable/disable LED night mode feature.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
Enable bool no Enable/Disable LED night mode feature.
StartingTime int yes Starting and Ending hour setting with range [0 - 23]
EndingTime int yes Starting and Ending hour setting with range [0 - 24]

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/routerleds/SetLedNightModeSetting2Result
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorInvalidInput The input setting is invalid
ErrorSetupFail The setting configuration is fail.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/routerleds/SetLedNightModeSetting2"

{
  "Enable": true,
  "StartingTime": 0,
  "EndingTime": 23
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

SetRouterLEDSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/routerleds/SetRouterLEDSettings
This action sets the router's LED settings.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
isSwitchportLEDEnabled bool no Whether the router's switchport LED should be enabled.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/routerleds/SetRouterLEDSettingsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/routerleds/SetRouterLEDSettings"

{
  "isSwitchportLEDEnabled": true
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}
